name: Lizard Survivors: Battle for Hyperborea
description:
• ULTRADYNAMIC roguelike gameplay
  • DEEP GENERATION of the game map according by ADVANCED algorithm
  • BEAUTIFUL PICTURES painted by hand
  • 8-bit mosaic on your screens
  • 52 POWERFUL PHONK TRACKS from talented MUSICIANS
  • BATTLE MASSACRE on the side of ancient lizards
  • LEGENDARY reconstruction of ANTIQUE battles
  • OBJECTION! unique debates, between slavs and lizards during EPIC BATTLES!
  • A lot of super HYPERBORIAN ARTEFACTS!
  • Resistance to SLAVIC TRIBES attacking lizard lands....
  • Day and night are literally changing)



  • Rottentail the Green - Fell into a cauldron of molerat tincture™️ and obtained incredible powers, at the cost of his tail.
  • Gennady the Sour - His fluffy comrade fell in battle, now that he has nothing left, only VENGEANCE remains!
  • Scalie, son of Snake - Wanted to shed his scales so much, he grew out limbs.

COWARDS DROPPED THEIR ARTIFACTS WHILE RETREATING! USE THEM IN BATTLE:



  • Throw XASS POWER SUPPLY UNITS Into their ranks
  • Incinerate the oppressors with their own FLAMES
  • Vaporize the bastards with a VAPE POD
  • Consume the powerful MOLERAT ROTGUT
  • Energize yourself with LIZARD ENERGY™️
  • Pierce your foes with reptile claws
  • And use tons of other unique items to cull through the enemy lines
